effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
